attributes.action: Stop any more Alleged Assylum Seekers entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not need any more assylum seekers until we have ZERO umemployment and ZERO housing shortages.We have enough immigrants draining our resources without any more,the country is already being targetted by everyone looking for an easy life at taxpayers expense.
It must stop before we become the ethnic minority in our own country.
